steps.section: Day -1: Prepare tissue collection tubes and plate
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"41vlk","text":"Label a sufficient number of 1.1 mL 12-well cluster tubes, and then place them in a new rack.     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":96,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cas_number":"","group_reagent":{},"guid":"2AB7F3FBD1F041E5931DEC11F65CA667","id":"","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"1.1 mL Polypropylene Cluster Tubes, 12-Tube Strip Format, Nonsterile","rrid":"","sku":"89005-574","url":"https://us.vwr.com/store/product?keyword=89005-574","vendor":{"id":521,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":null,"name":"VWR International"}}}}}

steps.section: Day -1: Prepare tissue collection tubes and plate
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4u3tu","text":"Add 5-10 2.0 mm Zirconia beads to each tube that will have tissue in it   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":72,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cas_number":"","group_reagent":{},"guid":"75C76EDAA2A141AA95AB722E529819D5","id":"","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"2.0 mm Zirconia beads","rrid":"","sku":"11079124ZX","url":"https://www.fishersci.com/shop/products/2-0-mm-zirconia-beads/NC0419764","vendor":{"id":374,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://biospec.com/","name":"BioSpec Products"}}}}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5aiqv","text":"Cover rack and tubes with resealable plate mat and leave in   until ready to use","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":60,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2pg2g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

steps.section: Day -1 (Or earlier): Design Well Layout for Tissue Collection tubes
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"91u3r","text":"Design the 96-well plate layout in which you will process (and eventually store) your samples","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"10t8u","text":"Dissect the mouse and open the abdominal cavity without disturbing the adipose tissue","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"13sqv","text":"Collect mesenteric lymph nodes, Peyer's patches, and proximal colon","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"14dcp","text":"Orient mesenteric adipose tissue so mesenteric lymph nodes (mLN) are easily identifiable and place all mesenteric lymph nodes (with capsule) in the 1.1 cluster tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d0lgv","text":"Extract all the Peyer's patches and place them in the cluster tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"21kl","text":"Cut  of proximal colon (the part of the colon that connects to the cecum)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b9k7n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3361}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7gaf3","text":"Seal tube tightly with cap. Put whole weight on it, if necessary; it must be sealed by any means necessary","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day -1: Prepare tissue collection tubes and plate
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"79d00","text":"Add  of RPMI 0% to a 24 well deep well plate    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":44,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9e63u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ecil7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dchga","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"6","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"(Approx)","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cas_number":"","group_reagent":{},"guid":"5C873C6940DF4BD882F41605DA3CAF0B","id":"","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"RPMI 0%","rrid":"","sku":"R7755","url":"https://www.sigmaaldrich.com/US/en/product/sigma/r7755","vendor":{"id":17,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"http://sigmaaldrich.com","name":"Merck MilliporeSigma (Sigma-Aldrich)"}}},"2":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cas_number":"","group_reagent":{},"guid":"1A64534D9A9644AFADD43C15E35C5715","id":"","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Sterile 24 Well Plate","rrid":"","sku":"103348-844","url":"https://us.vwr.com/store/catalog/product.jsp?catalog_number=76808-494","vendor":{"id":521,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":null,"name":"VWR International"}}}}}

steps.section: Day -1: Prepare tissue collection tubes and plate
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2oe3o","text":"Retrieve enough 12-well cluster tube caps for your cluster tubes   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":65,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dspgu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cas_number":"","group_reagent":{},"guid":"CC7148E85FCD4379B5CC9A898F479F42","id":"","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"12-Well Cluster Tube Caps","rrid":"","sku":"89005-728","url":"https://us.vwr.com/store/product?keyword=89005-728","vendor":{"id":521,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":null,"name":"VWR International"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ke1g","text":"Bead beat plate in SPEX MiniG Tissue Homogenizer for 5 min at 1500 rpm  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":70,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3kdct","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eir8u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cvl5r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"1500","start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":32,"unit":33}},"1":{"type":"equipment","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"brand":"SPEX","can_edit":0,"file":{"icon":"","id":null,"name":"","source":""},"guid":"452987E9341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","image":{"icon":"https://www.protocols.io/img/extensions/jpg.png","id":28022,"name":"minig.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/5myft4w.jpg"},"link":null,"name":null,"sku":"SP 1600","specifications":"MiniG 1600 Automated Tissue Homogenizer and Cell Lyser","type":null,"vendor":{"id":0,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":null},"is_requested":false,"link":null,"name":""}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1u5ku","text":"Seal the bead beater with the 96 well plate mat and a paper towel to examine if there is serious leakage","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ltu0","text":"     Once the plate is done beating:  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dr3h7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"3000","duration":120,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":32,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4j9is","text":"     While the plate is spinning, set up the Multi-well Plate Manifold with a 96-well silica plate on top","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cveal","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1r4am","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ai87v","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5o46g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cas_number":"","group_reagent":{},"guid":"46CB84F2BD484F29ABA892D3CEEB4657","id":"","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"EconoSpin 96 Well DNA \u0026 RNA Binding Plate","rrid":"","sku":"2020-001","url":"https://epochlifescience.com/collections/spin-column/products/econospin%C2%AE-96-well-filter-plate-for-dna-rna-full-skirted?variant=44336025600291","vendor":{"id":850,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"http://www.epochlifescience.com/","name":"Epoch plate manifold","sku":"5017","specifications":"","type":"Vacuum {"blocks":[{"key":"hoib","text":"Once the plate is done spinning, add 100 uL of tissue supernatant to theRLT-DTT plate ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6agrh","text":"Use the pipet that you transfer the organ homogenate to pipet up and down to mix the RLT with the homogenate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dpufc","text":"Once the 100 uL has been transferred to the RLT-DTT plate, the RNA is stable, and you can transfer the 200 uL of the remaining homogenate to another deep 96-well plate for FFU titers  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":182,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cas_number":"","group_reagent":{},"guid":"0E2100F93ABC4DFDA10A460B1501D6C5","id":"","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Deep 96 Well Plate","rrid":"","sku":"10011-940","url":"https://us.vwr.com/store/product?keyword=47734-788","vendor":{"id":521,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":null,"name":"VWR International"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dnene","text":"Add 350 uL of pure ethanol to the RLT-DTT well plate and do not mix here  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":72,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cas_number":"64-17-5","group_reagent":{},"guid":"4DAE632A162544A69542902915C510E8","id":"","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Ethyl alcohol, Pure","rrid":"","sku":"E7023","url":"https://www.sigmaaldrich.com/US/en/product/sigald/e7023","vendor":{"id":17,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"http://sigmaaldrich.com","name":"Merck MilliporeSigma (Sigma-Aldrich)"}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b97pf","text":"Turn the vacuum on to prepare the silica plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1g674","text":"With a new pipet tip, mix the RLT+Ethanol solution and transfer to the silica plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"769ge","text":"Transfer the solution with the same pipet you mix the ethanol with the pipet ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"425gg","text":"The solution should take ~1 minute, usually less to suck through","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a27co","text":"Wash the silica plate with 350 uL RW1 Buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f95iu","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"41AD06B1341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Buffer RW1","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"1053394","stats":{"total_protocols":0},"url":"https://www.qiagen.com/us/products/discovery-and-translational-research/lab-essentials/buffers-reagents/buffer-rw1/#orderinginformation","vendor":{"id":0,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.qiagen.com/us/products/","name":"Qiagen"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9n4al","text":"Wash the silica plate with 800 uL RPE Buffer (10 mM Tris-Cl + 80% Ethanol)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1hclh","text":" Dry the plate   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":15,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"abp7r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"3000","duration":120,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":32,"unit":34}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"31vk4","text":" Place plate onto an elution skirted plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f57n7","text":"Elute by adding 75 uL of DEPC treated water to the wells and   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fdd9j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"3000","duration":120,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":32,"unit":34}}}}

title: MHV Tissue Titering Protocol
